pokemon.name: BULBASAUR
pokemon.description: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.

pokemon.name: IVYSAUR
pokemon.description: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.

pokemon.name: VENUSAUR
pokemon.description: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokemon.

pokemon.name: CHARMANDER
pokemon.description: The fire on the tip of its tail is a measure of its life. If healthy, its tail burns intensely.

pokemon.name: CHARMELEON
pokemon.description: In the rocky mountains where CHARMELEON live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.

pokemon.name: CHARIZARD
pokemon.description: It is said that CHARIZARD's fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.

pokemon.name: SQUIRTLE
pokemon.description: It shelters itself in its shell, then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.

pokemon.name: WARTORTLE
pokemon.description: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.

pokemon.name: BLASTOISE
pokemon.description: The jets of water it spouts from the rocket cannons on its shell can punch through thick steel.

pokemon.name: CATERPIE
pokemon.description: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
